desc: Checks whether an object is of a certain type. If the object has the type with the specified name in its hierarchy, this function will return true.

args.name: type
args.desc: The name of the type to check for.

rets.name: bool
rets.desc: True if the object is of the specified type, false otherwise.

note: For GPUImg, it returns true for the folowing types: 'GPU', 'imageData', 'GPU.imageData', 'LK12'
